reviewText: This is Vanessa Williams' first of two video collections on vhs the second being The Comfort Zone from the album of the same name, this video collection is a look at an early music career in the making, these videos are from her first album released in 1988 titled The Right Stuff,  the music is catchy and the dancing is fun, this vhs collection is a must for any fan, Vanessa Williams has proven herself to be a talented singer/actress, proving to all that she does have....The Right Stuff!
